alert.note: Alert for Wilson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 4:46PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Wilson County through 515 PM CDT... At 445 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fredonia, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fredonia, Benedict and Coyville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
